sqlMap.select: SELECT NOTIFICATION_ID AS notificationId, EMPLOYEE_ID AS employeeId, NOTIFICATION_DESC AS notificationDesc, TO_CHAR(NOTIFICATION_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS notificationDateInString, IS_READ AS isRead, TO_CHAR(READ_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') AS readDateInString, NOTIFICATION_URL AS notificationUrl, SESSION_PARAMETER AS sessionParameter FROM NOTIFICATIONS WHERE TO_CHAR(NOTIFICATION_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - TO_NUMBER(FGETGENERALPARAMETERVALUE('logKeepingDays'))),'yyyy-MM-dd')
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM NOTIFICATIONS WHERE TO_CHAR(NOTIFICATION_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd') <= TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - TO_NUMBER(FGETGENERALPARAMETERVALUE('logKeepingDays'))),'yyyy-MM-dd')
